lead_paragraph: STRANGE--Ruth Ella, age 102, Beech Grove Road, Prompton, PA, died on her birthday March 25, 2016 at home. Born March 25, 1914 in Port Chester, NY, Ruth was the daughter of the late Evalyn Bowen Slater of Hawley, PA and Solon E. Slater of Port Chester, NY. She graduated from Port Chester High School, attended Syracuse University and entered the financial industry as a bank teller in Port Chester. It was there she met her husband George W. Strange, Jr. After the death of her husband in WWII, she moved to her family's farm on Beech Grove Road where she resided for the remainder of her life. Ruth was a 4-H leader teaching cookery and sewing. A member of the United Methodist Church of Honesdale. She was a fine musician with a quality contralto voice. In her youth she was a ballet dancer with a corps in New York. Ruth was a life member of the Wayne County Historical Society, a member of the Beech Grove Grange, Friends of the Library and supported Fire and ambulance companies. She had a deep knowledge local history that took her to Great Britain to research family genealogy. She was predeceased by her husband and their infant son Donald; and her five brothers Carlton, Irwin, William, Ralph and David. Ruth is survived by her daughter Christy Ann Strange, of Virginia City, NV; granddaughter and spouse Corie Ann and Robert Naugle of Las Vegas, NV, great-grandchildren Justus Charles and Alexus Ann. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STRANGE, RUTH ELLA
